data.title: Ports of arrivals and departures
data.meta_description: Ports of arrivals and departures. ‚úÖ Vodohod - Full Service River Cruise Tour Operator. üî•Across Our Fleet of 26 Ships,‚≠ê Ranging From 3-5 Stars.
data.text:
Good to know:

On the embarkation day the check-in begins since 14.00. In case the passengers come onboard after this time, the check-in can be done at any time. Kindly note, that on the embarkation day the service starts with dinner. In case the passengers arrive after 23.00 the boxed meal is provided instead of dinner. If the passengers come onboard earlier than 14.00 they can explore the ship and take a short rest in bars, on decks or other public places onboard until your cabin is ready.

As for the disembarkation day, please be aware that check-out is to be done at 9.00 after the breakfast. Since this moment the passengers can expect for the transfer in bars, on decks or other public places onboard.

Responsibility for the timely arrival on the ship lies entirely with the passenger. If the passenger is late or does not appear for embarkation for any reason, the cruise is canceled and the cost of the cruise is not refunded.

Moscow ‚Äî The North River Passenger Terminal

Docking area: The North River Passenger Terminal (Severny Rechnoy Vokzal)

Address: Moscow, Leningradskoye shosse, 51

Metro: Retchno√Ø Vokzal

Passage to the ships

At the piers of the North River Passenger Terminal there is a security system, mandatory for all cruise companies and passengers. Passage to the ship is carried out through special booths, where the luggage is inspected (scanned) and passengers pass through the frame of the metal detector.

We recommend to come to the embarkation in advance in order to avoid missing the departure of the ship.

Saint-Petersburg

Utkina Zavod Pier

Address: Oktyabrskaya Naberezhnaya (embankment) , 31.

Metro: Proletarskaya

The pier is located on the opposite bank fr om the River station, upstream of the Neva river.

At your disposal at the pier: Wi-Fi, waiting room, WC, luggage storage, ATM, paid parking.

Passage to the ships

At the Utkina Zavod pier there is a security system, mandatory for all cruise companies and passengers.

The port security service regulates the passage to the piers on a boarding pass and an identity document.

Passage to the ship is carried out through special booths, wh ere the luggage is inspected (scanned) and passengers pass through the frame of the metal detector.

We recommend to come to the embarkation in advance in order to avoid missing the departure of the ship.

Shuttle bus ¬´Vodohod¬ª

A free shuttle bus (with the Vodohod sign) is organized for tourists from Proletarskaya metro station to the pier Utkina Zavod. You can find the bus schedule at the reception desk on board the ship.

Due to the prohibition of parking in the Proletarskaya metro area, the Vodohod shuttle bus will stop only for passengers boarding and disembarking for a period of not more than 2 minutes.

Public transport

If you didn‚Äôt catch the shuttle bus or want to get to the metro/to the ship at a time when the shuttle bus service is not provided, you can use public transport, which runs between the Lomonosovskaya metro station and Utkina Zavod district. On this route there are buses and minibuses No. 476, 119 from 07:00 to 23:00.

Nizhny Novgorod

Docking area: River Port

Address: Markin Square 15a

Kazan

Docking area: River Port

Address: Devyataeva str. 1

Astrakhan

Docking area: River Port Address: Kremlyovskaya Str.4

Krasnoyarsk

Address: Krasnoyarsk, Dubrovinskogo Str. 1A, piers 7, 8

Dudinka

Address: Passenger pier of the Polar Transport Branch of PJSC MMC Norilsk Nickel.

Rostov-on-Don

Address: Rostov-on-Don, Beregovaya str., 10.
